alert.note: Alert for Haralson; Paulding; Polk (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 7:14PM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Paulding, Haralson, western Carroll and southern Polk Counties through 800 PM EST... At 714 PM EST, a line of strong thunderstorms was along a line extending from Tallapoosa to near Lake Wedowee, and moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...40 mph wind and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Heavy rain may cause temporary street flooding especially in poor drainage areas. Locations impacted include... Carrollton, Cedartown, Buchanan, Bremen, Temple, Rockmart, Tallapoosa, Bowdon, Mount Zion, Aragon, Waco, Braswell, Yorkville, Fish Creek, Eubank Lake, Bowdon Junction, Antioch, Van Wert, Draketown and Felton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. Motorists should slow down and be prepared for possible loss of control due to hydroplaning.
